data.title: Anthony Michael Hall Movies and Shows
data.meta_description: Learn about Anthony Michael Hall on Apple TV. Browse shows and movies that feature Anthony Michael Hall including The Dark Knight, Weird Science, and â¦
data.text:
The First Cut Is the Deepest

Drama plans a welcome-back party for Vince at his new condo, but his obsession with keeping the place pristine puts a damper on the festivities. Ari and Mrs. Ari learn that their son may not get into their daughter's exclusive private school. Billy's insecurities prevent Eric and Vince from seeing the first cut of 'Medellin.'

No Trout About It

An eccentric police consultant is brought into the SBPD to interview Shawn, Gus, Lassiter and Juliet about their seemingly poor police work on a tough case.

S.E.I.Z.E. The Day

Lassiter must enlist Shawn and Gus to help him take down a dangerous criminal who tried to kill the Santa Barbara PD's quirky Interim Chief Trout.

Someone's Got a Woody

Woody the Coroner is taken hostage and although Shawn, Gus, Lassiter and Detective O'Hare try carefully to resolve the situation, Interim Chief Trout has a plan of his own.
